short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom new tab page for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CalmScreen is an extension that is designed to create a customized new tab page just for you. Our goal with this extension is that we want you to start off your day with a smile with our motivational quote system as well as customizable features fit for your needs. 

The extension includes these features: 

Daytime/Nighttime Mode: Easily switch between day and night modes with the slider on the bottom left corner.
Motivational Quotes: A fresh motivational quote is provided for you every time you open or refresh the Chrome browser.
Shortcuts for YouTube and Gmail.
Recent Sites: Quickly revisit your most recently visited sites with icons displayed below the search bar.

Background Image Credit: Simon Berger

CalmScreen is proudly co-created by Nir Weinberg and Qamar Syed
